name: Trinity Brand Group
description:
Trinity Brand Group is an award-winning, independent global brand strategy and design firm with locations in the San Francisco Bay Area, Chicago, and Ireland. We offer clients the best of both worlds: the iconic branding experience of a big agency and the nimbleness and transparency of a smaller firm.
As specialists in creative strategy, branding, identity, packaging design, and communications, we help new and established brands realize their full potential.
